seg.translation: Linz: Garden shed in allotment gardens burnt down
Linz: garden shed burns in allotment area
Linz: Garden Hut on Fire in Allotment Settlement

seg.source: Um 14.13 Uhr wurde die Berufsfeuerwehr Linz zu einem Brand in den Angererhofweg alarmiert.
seg.translation: At 14.13 the Linz professional fire department was notified of a fire in Angererhofweg.
At 2:13pm, Linz fire department were alerted to a fire in Angererhofweg.
At 2: 13 p.m., the Linz Fire Department was alerted to a fire in Angererhofweg.

seg.source: Weil eine Hochspannungsleitung direkt über die Schrebergartensiedlung führt, war Gefahr in Verzug.
seg.translation: As a high-voltage power line directly traverses the allotment garden, danger was imminent.
Due to the fact that a high voltage line runs directly above the allotment, danger was imminent.
Because a high-voltage power line leads directly over the allotment, danger was in arrears.

seg.source: Die Berufsfeuerwehr rückte aus und fand beim eintreffen die Hütte in Vollbrand vor.
seg.translation: The professional fire brigade drove out and on arrival found the hut fully in flames.
Professional firefighters went out to find the shed fully ablaze.
The professional fire brigade moved out and found the hut on fire when they arrived.

seg.source: Das Dach musste praktisch zur Gänze entfernt und Brandschutt im unbedingt erforderlichen Ausmaß ausgeräumt werden.
seg.translation: The roof had to be almost completely removed and the huge amount of debris needed clearing.
Practically the entire roof had to be removed and all debris had to be cleared as necessary.
The roof had to be removed practically in its entirety and fire debris had to be cleared to the extent absolutely necessary.

seg.source: Laut Besitzer der brennenden Gartenhütte hatte er zu Mittag einen Akku zum Laden angesteckt.
seg.translation: The owner of the burning garden hut stated that at noon he had connected a battery to the power supply for charging.
The owner of the burning shed said that he had plugged in a battery to charge at midday.
According to the owner of the burning garden shed, he had plugged in a battery for charging at lunchtime.

seg.source: Das könnte eventuell die Brandursache sein.
seg.translation: This was the possible cause of the fire.
This may have been the cause of the fire.
This could possibly be the cause of the fire.

seg.source: Jedenfalls befand sich das Ladegerät laut Feuerwehr im Bereich der größten Brandintensität.
seg.translation: According to the fire department the loading unit was in the most intensive area of the fire.
In any case, the fire department found that the charging device was in the area of highest fire intensity.
In any case, according to the fire department, the charger was in the area of the greatest fire intensity.

seg.source: Der Schaden, der durch den Brand entstanden ist, muss noch - ebenso wie die Brandursache - ermittelt werden.
seg.translation: The damage caused by the fire, and the cause of the fire, still needs to be investigated.
The damage caused by the fire, as well as the exact cause, is yet to be determined.
The damage caused by the fire has yet to be determined, as has the cause of the fire.

seg.source: Er dürfte allerdings beträchtlich sein, denn der Besitzer hatte in seiner Gartenhütte viele Sammlerstücke.
seg.translation: The damage could be considerable as the owner stored many collectibles in his garden hut.
The damage may prove to be significant, as the owner of the shed had many collectibles in his garden shed.
However, it is likely to be considerable, as the owner had many collectibles in his garden shed.
